description: Try our easy to follow Festive White Chocolate Pistachio Ice Cream With Berries recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Festive White Chocolate Pistachio Ice Cream With Berries
name: Festive White Chocolate Pistachio Ice Cream With Berries Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Dip pan in hot water for 10 seconds. Turn out onto a serving platter. Serve topped with raspberries, strawberries, extra pistachios and white chocolate curls.
